question: Guy Warren/Kofi Ghanaba is best known as the inventor of Afro-jazz music. Where he is from?
explanation: Guy Warren of Ghana, also known as Kofi Ghanaba, was a Ghanaian musician, best known as the inventor of Afro-jazz — "the reuniting of African-American jazz with its African roots"— and as a member of The Tempos, alongside E. T. Mensah.
